Class SettingsPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • es.ucm.fdi.tp.practica6.views.SettingsPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class SettingsPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    The settingsPanel contains all the settings for a game.
    Author:
    Jorge
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • SettingsPanel

        public SettingsPanel(java.lang.String[] playerIds,
                     java.lang.Boolean isAiBanned,
                     java.lang.Boolean isRandBanned,
                     java.lang.String owner)
        Constructs a new settings panel with all the necessary info.
        Parameters:
        playerIds - Array of String(s) containing the playerIds' Ids.
        isAiBanned - whether there is an ai player.
        isRandBanned - wether there is a random player.
        owner - set to null if Single Window, contains the window's owner Id if Multi Window.
